Reviews.Title: Polaroid CTA-1455B 14mp.
Reviews.Author: scrapbuilt
Reviews.Content: I have been very impressed with this lil camera. This cam in in my top 3 online perchases and the other 2 were were auctions so this was probably the best perchase I have ever made. This cam was on sale for between $25 and $30. I figured at that price even if it wasnt to great I could give it to my grand daughter. I still have it. I like it very much. The one click between video and still is very easy and quick to use. The photos at 14mp are very good. It has a lot of other features that make it a very good value. Cameras like this are always well over $100, I wish I would have bought more. I can't even find this model on line any more so if you do see one at a good price buy it its a very good point and shoot cam.

ProductInfo.Features:
14.0 megapixel resolution
2.7" bright color LCD for previewing images before you shoot
SD/SDHC Compatible for expanded memory
Anti-shake image stabilization
Face tracking for perfect faces in your pictures
ProductInfo.Name: Polaroid CTA-1455B 14 Megapixel Digital Camera (Black)
